english.segment1: Mundane predictability. Dawns on me like the sunrise. There's no unknown within the place. Where I exist
english.segment2: Mechanic like occurrence. Of each days routine. With prosaic efficiency. That steals the dream
english.segment3: If you always do what you've always done. And you always sing what you've always sung. Then you'll always get what you always had. If you always go where you've always been. You'll always see what you've always seen. And you'll always be who you always are
english.segment4: It's time for change, can't live like this no more. It's time for change, can't live like this no more
english.segment5: The insecurity of difference. It threatens my very core. It wraps and binds me up. To the comfort point
